A '''sculk vein''' is a block found in the [[deep dark]] or generated by [[sculk catalyst]]s. It can generate or be placed on any side of a solid block.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Sculk veins can be mined with any tool, but [[hoe]]s are the quickest. A sculk vein drops itself only if it is broken with a [[tool]] enchanted with [[Silk Touch]]. Otherwise, it drops nothing.
{{Breaking row|Sculk Vein|Hoe|drop=0|horizontal=1}}

=== Natural generation ===
{{main|Sculk vein (feature)}}
Sculk veins are generated within the [[deep dark]] biome.

{{block distribution}}

=== Post-generation ===
Sculk veins generate when a mob dies within 8 blocks of a [[sculk catalyst]].

== Usage ==
Sculk veins can be placed on any and multiple sides of a block, similar to [[glow lichen]].

Sculk veins cannot be destroyed by flowing [[water]] or [[lava]].<ref>{{bug|MC-251170||Sculk veins sometimes are not waterlogged when next to water|WAI}}</ref>
